title: Calories in Pretzels
meta_description: Discover calories in pretzels per standard serving, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium details, and easy tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Hard, salted pretzels; standard 28 g (1 oz) serving from commercial brands, no dips or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (hard/soft), flavor, size, and preparation. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A 28 g serving of hard pretzels provides about 110 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp mustard dip per serving
Soft pretzel equivalent serving (baked, no butter)

faqs.q: How many calories in pretzels per serving?
faqs.a: About 110 kcal in a 28 g serving of hard pretzels.
Yes, a serving has 23 g carbs, mainly from refined flour.
One serving contains around 340 mg sodium due to salting.

faqs.q: Calories in soft pretzels vs hard?
faqs.a: Soft pretzels average 130-150 kcal per similar-sized serving, depending on toppings.

faqs.q: Do pretzels have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: Modest amounts: 3 g protein and 1 g fat per 28 g serving.
